headline: Google just censored more “undesired” media
description:
Just a couple of minutes ago (around 8:45pm GMT) Google removed the Youtube channel of the two Russians who called Ben Wallace and Priti Patel and posed as Prime Minister of Ukraine - https://www.youtube.com/channel/UC7aFhtshxOnaqioFAJ0ZSvA

Say whatever you want about the stunt itself but nothing in there was made up or falsified. They actually even redacted certain parts of the conversation they deemed confidential.

It's all fun and games until the US and the EU start adopting the very same totalitarian measures, they have been critising for decades in other countries.

The conversation with Ben Wallace can be watched in its entirety (excluding the redacted parts) at https://odysee.com/@RaymondTheBrave:5/Full-Video-by-Vovan-and-Lexus-with-UK-Secretary-of-State-for-Defence-Ben-Wallace:a
headline_zh-Hans: 谷歌刚刚审查了更多 "不受欢迎 "的媒体
headline_zh-Hant: 谷歌剛剛審查了更多 "不受歡迎 "的媒體
description_zh-Hans:
就在几分钟前（格林尼治标准时间晚上8点45分左右），谷歌删除了两个俄罗斯人的Youtube频道，他们给本-华莱士和普里蒂-帕特尔打电话，冒充乌克兰总理--https://www.youtube.com/channel/UC7aFhtshxOnaqioFAJ0ZSvA

对于这个噱头本身，你想怎么说就怎么说，但里面没有任何内容是编造或伪造的。

这一切都很有趣，直到美国和欧盟开始采取同样的极权主义措施，他们已经在其他国家批评了几十年。

与本-华莱士的对话可以在以下网址观看全文（不包括被编辑的部分）：https://odysee.com/@RaymondTheBrave:5/Full-Video-by-Vovan and-Lexus-with-UK-Secretary-of-State for-Defence-Ben-Wallace:a
description_zh-Hant:
就在幾分鐘前（格林尼治標準時間晚上8點45分左右），谷歌刪除了兩個俄羅斯人的Youtube頻道，他們給本-華萊士和普里蒂-帕特爾打電話，冒充烏克蘭總理--https://www.youtube.com/channel/UC7aFhtshxOnaqioFAJ0ZSvA

對於這個噱頭本身，你想怎麼說就怎麼說，但裡面沒有任何內容是編造或偽造的。

這一切都很有趣，直到美國和歐盟開始採取同樣的極權主義措施，他們已經在其他國家批評了幾十年。

與本-華萊士的對話可以在以下網址觀看全文（不包括被編輯的部分）：https://odysee.com/@RaymondTheBrave:5/Full-Video-by-Vovan and-Lexus-with-UK-Secretary-of-State for-Defence-Ben-Wallace:a
